ygData.messageBody:
=)

All you guys are SOO sweet! I knew there was a problem, and EVERYTHING is
red to our pets. I hope our petition sheds some light.
I though I would get flamed as a little whiner, apparently I've struck a
chord. YAY!!

~Xill

>From: "Roadrunner Support" <service@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
>Date: Wed, 30 Jun 1999 08:42:07 -0400
>
>From: "Roadrunner Support" <service@...>
>
>
>Hey Xillith,
>
>With regard to the pet issue, I saw the same thing in dueling as my SK back
>in my CandyLand days on Veeshan. Now, every once in a while on Zek, as a
>Necromancer, I see the same thing, so its not just a SK issue. I'm not sure
>whether its a bug, but I've also heard that pets will sometimes be less
>than
>willing to attack something that cons red to them. My latest experience
>with
>this was with Codil the Naked Monk outside Freeport. He was only yellow to
>me, and I'd have taken him down, had my pet felt compelled to join me
>rather
>than the other spectators. However, like you said, PvP is the only instance
>in which I've seen this happen, never during combat with an NPC, which
>leads
>me to believe it's another one of Verant's little oversights.
>
>So if they did not intend pets to be used in PvP, they certainly need to
>change some code, at least on Zek. If we can summon a pet, we should have
>complete control over it and it should attack anything we direct it to,
>whether that something is a Large Rat or a Hill Giant.
>
>Malvolin(Tier'Dal Necromancer)--Rallos Zek
>Azalin(Human Shadowknight...WHY won't they let me move him?!?!?)--Veeshan
>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
>To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Date: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 12:56 PM
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
>
>
> >From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
> >
> >Fine.
> >
> >Point well made. Yet, there is in fact a PvP server with unique rules
>not
> >found on any of the others for PvP ballance. Ok, I am calm again. Let me
> >ask this of you:
> >
> >How do you know what was intended upon design?
> >
> > We ARE ok in player vs monster. My gripe is that I want ALL of my
>powers
> >to be brought to bear when commanded, that includes the pet. Duels exist
>on
> >the other servers as well and I have to forget about my signature ability
> >while in one. That is foolish. Regardless of what was "intended". We
>are
> >the only class that cannot use all of our powers all of the time. How do
> >you justify that?
> >
> >I will not complain again if the pet would just CONTRIBUTE, it makes THAT
> >MUCH OF A DIFFERENCE!! A single interrupt on a wizard, just ONE will
>allow
> >me to flee or even consider fighting her! Instead it just stands there
> >looking silly as I die. Against a Ranger or Paladin the pet has no
> >offensive value BUT, do they know I am an SK if they haven't seen me?
>Will
> >they take the time to consider it and realize its green? In either case,
> >opening with the pet puts THE PET in their target window, not me. I can
>now
> >use Darkness and Fear without expecting a Blindness to get me because I
>need
> >to be trageted first! Suddenly my level 8 pet becomes a true treasure
>even
> >when I am 21st level waiting on the next one. As it stands, an SK in a
> >duel is a foolish SK.
> >
> >Roleplay IS infact what this game is about. Teaming up and facing the
> >unknown. There are times though, when the gloves need to come off. When
>it
> >comes down to true grit and a keen strategy. It is THEN that we are
>hurt.
> >
> >I still love my DE female SK. If I were stacking stats and not playing a
> >role I would always take the Ogre ( not knocking on The Horde or
> >anything...heh ).
> >
> >Hey, wizard DD casting times have dropped. How does THAT figure into
> >roleplay? If you feel the game is being reduced to hack and slash,
>you're
> >right. Bitch at Verant.
> >
> >When is Microsoft releasing their game?
> >
> >~Xillith
> >
> >
